title: Pair of Leg Wraps and Ties
description: leg wraps:  woven with striped horizontal bands in brown, black, red, white, beige in varying widths; ties:  woven geometric pattern in red, green, black, white; extra red added to self-fringe
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
